Plot: A young boy has lost his mother and is losing touch with his father and the world around him. Then he meets Hesher who manages to make his life even more chaotic.
Title: Hesher
Writer: Spencer Susser, David Michôd, Brian Charles Frank (story)
Actors: Joseph Gordon-Levitt, Devin Brochu, Rainn Wilson, Piper Laurie
tomatoConsensus: It has a dark sense of humor and a refreshing lack of sentimentality, but like its title character, Hesher isn't really interested in going anywhere.
